title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item on the first attempt in the library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so on the first try. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node instead.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

OB: When trying to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus jumps to the library file node instead.
EB: On the second attempt, the label item can be successfully selected.
SR: 1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view. Notice that the focus jumps to the library file node instead of the selected item.
